document.full_text: the u.s. government on friday said that "miniscule" amounts of radiation were detected in sacramento, california, but that no radiation levels of concern have been uncovered in united states.
document.title: no radiation levels of concern detected in u.s.: government
lines_and_colors: the u.s. government on friday said that "miniscule" amounts of radiation were detected in sacramento, california, but that no radiation levels of concern have been uncovered in united states.
